Module org.nasdanika.html.model.bootstrap
Package org.nasdanika.html.model.bootstrap

Interface Text

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
TextImpl
public interface Text extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
A representation of the model object 'Text'. Text styling.

The following features are supported:

  • Alignment
  • Color
  • Transform
  • Weight
  • Monospace
  • Italic
  • Nowrap
  • Truncate
See Also:
  • BootstrapPackage.getText()
